lessonOutcomes.outcome: Students can read along with a familiar story, echo key phrases, and take part in group role-plays to show understanding of the text.
Students can use role-play to confidently express their ideas, show creativity in retelling the story, and recognise how the characters feel at different moments.
Students can reflect on the importance of listening to trusted adults and being cautious with strangers, discussing the moral of the story and how it applies to real-life situations.
